CORE MISSION_STATEMENT

We are a 14-floor vertical transit vessel that records true crime narratives about its own passengers. Due to high-altitude desert static, all investigators have lost their identity. We solve crimes we cannot remember in a car that smells like a floral explosion at a circuit factory.
